channel.title: Question about innovationx.. weird error
channel.description:
Really weird to ask I know, but most of the people out there are having issues with the client. The server is running fine with just me on my own computer (127.0.0.1), but when I enter my no-ip address, it doesn't seem to work. :confused: At first I thought that something was just wrong with the client, but I soon discovered otherwise. The client is able to connect to other servers I have on my computer (old czar age stuff), but isn't able to connect to this one using my no-ip address. Has anybody run into this issue at all, or do you know how to possibly fix? checked my server class, and it's running on port 43594, same as the client. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Here's a video I uploaded showing utorrent's port check working for other servers on my computer but not this one. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A6wc-o9ZjBI
And here's the link to the server I'm using. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457163.msg3345963.html#msg3345963

item.title: Question about innovationx.. weird error
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:

Really weird to ask I know, but most of the people out there are having issues with the client. The server is running fine with just me on my own computer (127.0.0.1), but when I enter my no-ip address, it doesn’t seem to work.
